segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting so patiently for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so trusting, just standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever worried about him falling off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must really want that cookie to be willing to stand there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing her so hopeful and excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet to see siblings working together like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get what they want without any trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a bit tense, but it's also kind of heartwarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile watching them cooperate like that.
segments.speaker: PAR
